References

   
Module AvalancheModifiers
Header /Engine/Plugins/Experimental/Avalanche/Source/AvalancheModifiers/Public/Modifiers/AvaAutoSizeModifier.h
Include #include "Modifiers/AvaAutoSizeModifier.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (MinimalAPI, BlueprintType)  
class UAvaAutoSizeModifier :  
    public UAvaGeometryBaseModifier ,  
    public IAvaTransformUpdateHandler ,  
    public IAvaRenderStateUpdateHandler ,  
    public IAvaSceneTreeUpdateHandler

Remarks

Adapts the modified actor geometry size/scale to match reference actor bounds and act as a background

Variables

  Type Name Description
bool bIncludeChildren If true, will include children bounds too and compute the new size
EAvaAutoSizeFitMode FitMode  
double PaddingHorizontal Padding for left and right side
double PaddingVertical Padding for top and bottom side
FAvaSceneTreeActor ReferenceActor
